video_prompt: Woman's serene gaze shifts slightly. Subtle lip movement. Hair strands sway gently. Golden ornaments shimmer as she subtly adjusts her pose. White mist swirls and dissipates around her. Fabric of her traditional attire rustles. Her hand subtly moves, adjusting her sleeve.
image_prompt: A medium portrait of a serene woman with white hair in an elaborate updo with golden ornaments, pale skin, red lips, and a bindi, wearing ornate traditional white and gold Chinese attire. She is set against a dark background with white mist. Soft, ethereal lighting.
refined_video_prompt: Her gaze subtly shifts, a faint smile playing on her lips. Hair strands gently sway. Golden ornaments shimmer with her subtle pose adjustment. White mist swirls, then dissipates around her. Her traditional attire's fabric rustles softly. A hand moves to adjust her sleeve.
